EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Roadmap: COVID-Era Transformation Insights for {{company.Company Name:default=Your Store}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your plans for {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}’s ongoing transformation probably look a lot different today than they did back in January.
And that’s ok. At NCR, we have one goal: to make change simple.
Start by checking out our latest eBook to get all-new research, tech trends, consumer sentiments and a step-by-step transformation plan that’s mapped to today’s new environment.
It’s pretty fascinating…and just in time for peak season.
And if we can help in any way? Just contact us <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]> and we’ll get right back to you. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
